summary: This is an automated notification from the Second Circuit Court of Appeals regarding docket activity in case 19-2221, United States of America v. Epstein. It records the addition of an attorney to the case and provides electronic notice information for the attorneys involved.

persons.name: Sarah Kathleen Eddy
persons.context: Listed as an attorney for the United States of America who will receive electronic notice of the docket activity.

persons.name: Martin G. Weinberg
persons.context: Listed as an attorney who will receive electronic notice of the docket activity, with email addresses provided.

persons.name: Reid Weingarten
persons.context: Listed as an attorney who will receive electronic notice of the docket activity, with email addresses provided.

events.title: Attorney Added to Epstein Appeal Case
events.description: An attorney was added to the case United States of America v. Epstein (19-2221) in the Second Circuit Court of Appeals, triggering an automated docket notification.

keyFacts: The document is a notification of docket activity from the Second Circuit Court of Appeals in case 19-2221, United States of America v. Epstein.
An attorney was added to the case on August 6, 2019, though the specific attorney's name is not listed in the visible text.
Electronic notice of this filing was sent to Assistant U.S. Attorney Sarah Kathleen Eddy and attorneys Martin G. Weinberg and Reid Weingarten.
The document references a prior filing, docket entry [16], in the appellate case.
